com.sony.smarteyeglass.extension.util
Class SmartEyeglassWidgetImage

java.lang.Object
  com.sony.smarteyeglass.extension.util.SmartEyeglassWidgetImage

public class SmartEyeglassWidgetImage
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a widget bitmap that conforms to SmartEyeglass standards for the top-level menu. Use to define a "card", the screen in the top menu that starts your app.
